name: UIControl.ContentHorizontalAlignment
desc: The horizontal alignment of content (text and images) within a control.

items.name: case center
items.desc: Aligns the content horizontally in the center of the control.

items.name: case left
items.desc: Aligns the content horizontally from the left of the control (the default).

items.name: case right
items.desc: Aligns the content horizontally from the right of the control

items.name: case fill
items.desc: Aligns the content horizontally to fill the content rectangles; text may wrap and images may be stretched.

items.name: case leading
items.desc: Aligns the content horizontally from the leading edge of the control.

items.name: case trailing
items.desc: Aligns the content horizontally from the trailing edge of the control.
